content: As part of the VHA privacy and security team, we were wondering the extent to which GraphQL has been adopted by applications and FHIR servers in order to determine our research priorities regarding its security and privacy aspects. We have already worked on a preliminary white paper which is published here. If you are working on using GraphQL or supporting GraphQL in your product, or aware of FHIR servers that currently support GraphQL could you respond to this thread?
Hi @Mohammad Jafari we are considering sub-resource restrictions (not necessarily GraphQL at this moment)
The use cases we have there are the ones we drafted for Permission. We're still in design phase

as far as I know, only the following servers support graphQL:

  • test.fhir.org (and related servers running the same software)
  • hapi
  • Asymmetrix
Hi folks, at b.well Connected Health, we are starting our journey with FHIR and GraphQL. We will be adding our learnings and contributing to the discussion in the coming days.
